data.description_html:
You cast the spell and a translucent wall springs up, its shimmering field pulsing with strong, malignant shades than spin and twist into each other.

This spell functions like wall of dispel magic, except that the effect is that of greater dispel magic (PH 223).
data.effect: A straight wall whose area is up to one 10-ft. square/level
data.name: Wall of Greater Dispel Magic
